pages.title: Comfortable
pages.text: Stand within range of a campfire at night to gain the $(thing)Comfortable$() effect.$(p)$(info) The $(thing)Comfortable$() effect increases the effect of eating.$(p)$(warning) This effect will disappear if hostile mobs are nearby.

pages.title: Well Fed
pages.text: Eat a lot of food with the $(thing)Comfortable$() effect to gain the $(thing)Well Fed$() effect.$(p)$(info) The $(thing)Well Fed$() effect increases your stamina.$(p)$(warning) This effect will disappear over time.

pages.title: Resting
pages.text: Stand still within range of a campfire at night to gain the $(thing)Resting$() effect.$(p)$(info) The $(thing)Resting$() effect slowly regenerates health.$(p)$(info) Continue standing still to increase the level of $(thing)Resting$().$(p)$(warning) This effect will disappear if hostile mobs are nearby.

pages.title: Well Rested
pages.text: Stand still with the $(thing)Resting$() effect to gain the $(thing)Well Rested$() effect.$(p)$(info) The $(thing)Well Rested$() effect adds two absorption hearts.$(p)$(warning) This effect will disappear over time.

pages.title: Focused
pages.text: Stand still with all effects to increase the $(thing)Focused$() effect duration.$(p)$(info) The $(thing)Focused$() effect increases experience gained.$(p)$(warning) This effect will disappear as you gain experience.
